snippet.title: Balls of Glory Pinball Launch Trailer | PS4, PS3, PS Vita
snippet.description:
The Balls of Glory Pinball Pack combines four hit animated TV show properties, Family Guy, American Dad!, Bob’s Burgers, and Archer for one epic pinball experience.

Download it now on PlayStation 3, PlayStation 4, and PlayStation Vita!

http://www.ballsofglory.com/
